dataList.content: <I'm seeing visions I've never seen!>
<These must be the owner's memories.>
This might be memories he partially lost due to the shock.

dataList.title: Bodhisattva Chicken
dataList.content: Phew... I finally found it. I thought he'd keep his top secret recipe locked away, but he was using it as a trivet...!

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: I-is that my restaurant's recipe? How did you get it?

dataList.title: Bodhisattva Chicken
dataList.content: I sent a spy. Did you really think a part-timer willing to come to the restaurant an hour early to help with preparations on minimum wage would really exist?

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: But why, why would you do this...!

dataList.title: Bodhisattva Chicken
dataList.content: I had no choice! If I don't meet the sales quota the HQ demands from me, my restaurant will be shut down!

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: The... The recipe's still in my head! Two spoons of sugar! One and a half spoons of soy sauce, and minced garlic...

dataList.title: Bodhisattva Chicken
dataList.content: It's no use, I'm about to burn it in the concept incinerator. All traces of the recipe will be gone, even the memory in your head.

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: NOOOOOOO!!

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: Two spoons of sugar! One and a half spoons of soy sauce...

dataList.title: Bodhisattva Chicken
dataList.content: Like I said... You should've closed your restaurant when I first warned you!

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: S-sugar... Was it sugar? I can't remember it at all...
I never liked that pest. Knew he was rotten from the N.S.I.B. plastered over his walls.
If it was put in the concept incinerator... That recipe is as good as gone...
What's a concept incinerator ab-
...Nevermind... Your face tells me I don't wanna ask about it.
What's that?
The concept incinerator...
It's a trusted method of permanently removing a technology.
For instance... It has the ability to make it as if Miss Faust never invented Mephistopheles.
Does it turn things back in time?
No, not quite. It simply...vanishes, as though the brain had never conceived it.
All documents about the technology, photographs, the tiniest bits and parts composing it, and even Miss Faust's own memories of it will be dimmed and erased.
The effectiveness and range of the incineration will depend on the price of the product.

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: It's true...! I can't remember if the sauce was based on pepper or soy sauce... How much sugar or salt I should put... Nothing of it's left in my head! None of my customers remember how it tasted!

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: There's no use trying at this point...! It's all useless...
Hmph, you're soft-hearted. Eunbong's? You should do away with that tacky name and give your restaurant a better title.

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: Eunbong is my mother's name...
Oh…
T.W.H.
...Tacky can also mean friendly warmth.
The problem is still your weak will!
<Just... Why are you so eager to start fights...>
Come! I will fix that helpless attitude of yours!
